entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
